expo.name: JoesFitness

infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to take photos so that users can compare these photos to see their progress in fitness.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app uses photo library to add photos into the Progress Page and let users to compare these photos to see progress.

expo.description: A gym app built for bodybuilders who want to make a detailed workout plan and record their progress.
